class1.title: Mathematics
class1.description: Learn the fundamentals of mathematics including algebra, geometry, trigonometry and calculus.

class2.title: English Language Arts
class2.description: Improve your reading, writing, and communication skills through literature and writing assignments.

class3.title: World History
class3.description: Explore the major events, ideas, and movements that have shaped human history.

class4.title: Biology
class4.description: Study the living world from cells to ecosystems, including genetics and evolution.

class5.title: General Science
class5.description: Science is the most important for now days life. We are surrounded by science.

class6.title: Physical Education
class6.description: Explore music theory and learn to play an instrument or sing in a choir.

class7.title: Computer Science
class7.description: Learn the basics of programming and develop computational thinking skills.

class8.title: Bangla Language
class8.description: Learn to read, write, and speak Bangla, including grammar and vocabulary.

class9.title: Chemistry
class9.description: Study the properties, composition, and reactions of matter.
